mandarin: 我不同意你的观点，但我誓死捍卫你说话的权力。
english: I do not agree with what you have to say, but I'll defend to the death your right to say it.
author: -- 伏尔泰 Voltaire

mandarin: 自由不是想做什么就做什么；自由是教会你不想做什么就可以不做什么！
english: Freedom is not letting you do whatever you wanna but teaching you not to do the things you don't wanna do.
author: --《实践理性批判》康德 Immanuel Kant

mandarin: 单靠法律并不能保证言论自由；要做到这一点，必须所有人都有包容精神。
english: Laws alone can not secure freedom of expression;
english1: in order that every man present his views without penalty there must be spirit of tolerance in the entire population.
author: -- 爱因斯坦 Einstein

mandarin: 学习不是填满水桶，而是点燃火焰！
english: Education is not the filling of a pail but the lighting of a fire
author: -- 叶芝 William Butler Yeats (爱尔兰诗人)

mandarin: 私有财产制度是自由最重要的保障；不仅仅是对那些有财产的人来说，对没有财产的人也是如此
english: The system of private property is the most important guarantee of freedom,
english1: not only for those who own property, but scarcely less for those who do not.
author: -- 冯 哈耶克 Friedrich August von Haye (经济学家)

mandarin: 未经反思的人生不值得去过。
english: The unexamined life is not worth living.
author: -- 苏格拉底 Socrates

mandarin: 简单是可靠的先决条件。
author: -- 艾兹格 迪科斯彻 Edsger Dijkstra (图灵奖得主)

mandarin: 高等教育的价值在于培训思维，而不再于传授事实。
english: The value of a collage education is not the learning of many facts but the training of the mind to think.
author: -- 爱因斯坦 Einstein

mandarin: 世上只有一种英雄主义: 就是在认清生活的真相之后依然热爱生活。
english: There is only one heroism in the world: to see the world as it is, and to love it.
author: -- 罗曼 罗兰 Romain Rolland

mandarin: 在一个崇高的目的的支持下，不停地工作。即使慢，也一定会获得成功。
english: With the support of a noble purpose, keep working. Even slow, will certainly be successful.
author: -- 爱因斯坦 Einstein

mandarin: 时间存在地意义就是任何事都不可能立刻实现。
english: The meaning of time is that nothing can be achieved at once.
author: -- 爱因斯坦 Einstein

mandarin: 过去、现在、未来之间的区别是一种持续不断的错觉。
english: The distinction between past, present and future is only a stubbornly persistent illusion.
author: -- 爱因斯坦 Einstein

mandarin: 拥有追随自己内心与直觉的勇气--你的内心与直觉已经知道你真正想要成为什么样的人。
english: Have the courage to follow your heart and intuition. They somehow already know what you truly want to become.
author: -- 乔布斯 Steve Jobs

mandarin: 短暂的人生不应该平凡地过下去！
english: Life is too short to be ordinary!
author: -- 章莹颖

english: 让我宝贵的年华和足迹——— 都一直留着....
english1: 给明天，给现在.. 和过去的自己
author: 莹颖 2013.1.15

mandarin: 何夜无月？何处无竹柏？但少闲人如吾两人者耳。
author: -- 苏轼
